column4: hey guys i made mistake of changing pas is there way to reset it wiv out knowing current password?
do you have another user on the system with sudo permission?
OK do you have another user other than "admin" that you know the password for?
simple reboot into recovery kernel and change the password for the admin user
on boot you do not see the grub menu, right?
reboot your system and hold the left shift key down
that will show you the grub menu
use the down arrow to boot the recovery kernel.
would u be alble to deflut pasword for me by remote assist?
it'll ask you for the new password.
now on my log in screen it had a drop tab for recovry is that the place where i use this command?
does the down arrow move from selection to selection?
im going to go try thanks ill be back in mmin
ok find one that says recovery
